price: و [سرانجام] او را به بهایی اندک ـ چند درهم ـ فروختند و در[بارۀ نگه داشتنِ] او بی‌میل بودند.
arabic: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَنِۭ بَخۡسٖ دَرَٰهِمَ مَعۡدُودَةٖ وَكَانُواْ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلزَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darāhima maʿdūdatin wakānū fīhi mina al-zāhidīna
